I'm working with collaborators at Cornell to develop an instrument that can record the sounds of the deep ocean - using elephant seals as our mobile platforms! Read more about the project [here](https://www.vox.com/down-to-earth/22945867/elephant-seals-listening-beaked-whales-ocean).
